title: Black Monday Roundup & Ranking the 6 Head Coaching Vacancies (Football 1/5)
description:
Another Black Monday in the books as more jobs opened up across the league. On this episode, Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech survey the landscape of moves and analyze the vacancies. If you want more in-depth breakdowns of the specific firings of Adam Gase, Doug Marrone and Anthony Lynn check out their respective emergency podcasts in the feed. Here, the guys discuss John Elway leaving the Broncos GM job open in favor of another role (3:10) and what GM job is the most attractive (9:45). The rankings continue as the Pick Six Superfriends then rank the 6 head coaching vacancies in terms of desirability (16:30). The Chargers have Justin Herbert, but the Jaguars have the #1 overall pick. What's better at this point? The Falcons, Texans, Lions and Jets will also be looking for new head coaches and we rank 'em all!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
